issue.title: [C++] Update arrow_parquet to account for API changes in PARQUET-573
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-283](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-283). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
PARQUET-573 introduced API changes due to revamping the metadata accessor functions that are breaking trunk.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-283?focusedCommentId=15469484) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 131
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/131>
